sql-map.name: AdvancesProductAccParameterMap
sql-map.mapped-statement: INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_ACPARAM (PROD_ID, CHK_ALLOWED, DISC_EOL_PERC, NUMBER_PATTERN, LAST_AC_NO, STAT_FREQ, NO_FREE_CHQ_LEAVES, FREE_CHQ_PERIOD, FREE_CHQ_START, LIMIT_DEF_ALLOWED, TEMP_OD_ALLOWED, STAFF_AC_OPENED, DEBIT_UNCLEAR_APPL, CREDIT_UNCLEAR_APPL, ISSUE_TOKEN, ALLOW_WD_SLIP, MAX_AMT_ALLOWED ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #chkAllowed:VARCHAR#, #discEolPerc:NUMERIC#, #numberPattern:VARCHAR#, #lastAcNo:VARCHAR#, #statFreq:NUMERIC#, #noFreeChqLeaves:NUMERIC#, #freeChqPeriod:NUMERIC#, #freeChqStart:DATE#, #limitDefAllowed:VARCHAR#, #tempOdAllowed:VARCHAR#, #staffAcOpened:VARCHAR#, #debitUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, #creditUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, #issueToken:VARCHAR#, #allowWdSlip:VARCHAR#, #maxAmtAllowed:NUMERIC#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_ACPARAM SET PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#, CHK_ALLOWED = #chkAllowed:VARCHAR#, DISC_EOL_PERC = #discEolPerc:NUMERIC#, NUMBER_PATTERN = #numberPattern:VARCHAR#, LAST_AC_NO = #lastAcNo:VARCHAR#, STAT_FREQ = #statFreq:NUMERIC#, NO_FREE_CHQ_LEAVES = #noFreeChqLeaves:NUMERIC#, FREE_CHQ_PERIOD = #freeChqPeriod:NUMERIC#, FREE_CHQ_START = #freeChqStart:DATE#, LIMIT_DEF_ALLOWED = #limitDefAllowed:VARCHAR#, TEMP_OD_ALLOWED = #tempOdAllowed:VARCHAR#, STAFF_AC_OPENED = #staffAcOpened:VARCHAR#, DEBIT_UNCLEAR_APPL = #debitUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, CREDIT_UNCLEAR_APPL = #creditUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, ISSUE_TOKEN = #issueToken:VARCHAR#, ALLOW_WD_SLIP = #allowWdSlip:VARCHAR#, MAX_AMT_ALLOWED = #maxAmtAllowed:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
